snippets.title: SK SEO Meta Update Endpoint
snippets.purpose: REST API endpoint for updating Yoast SEO meta (title, description) via /sk/v1/update-seo
snippets.root_cause: Yoast REST API does not expose meta fields for direct update

snippets.title: SK FAQ Schema by Page
snippets.purpose: Adds FAQ Schema markup to pages with language support. Data stored in sk_faq_data option
snippets.root_cause: No native FAQ schema support in Yoast free version
snippets.notes: Supports TranslatePress language detection. Use POST /sk/v1/faq with page_id, faqs, and optional lang

snippets.title: SK hreflang x-default
snippets.purpose: Adds x-default hreflang tag for multilingual SEO
snippets.root_cause: TranslatePress does not add x-default hreflang by default

snippets.title: SK Elementor Data API
snippets.purpose: REST API for reading and updating Elementor content directly
snippets.root_cause: Elementor does not expose _elementor_data via REST API
snippets.notes: CRITICAL: Main tool for editing Elementor pages. GET /elementor/{id}, POST /elementor/{id}/replace

snippets.title: SK TRP Update ID v4
snippets.purpose: Update TranslatePress translations by row ID with status change
snippets.root_cause: trp-add creates entries but cannot update existing entries status
snippets.notes: Table format: wp_trp_dictionary_et_{lang} where lang = en_gb, ru_ru, fi. POST /trp-update-id with id, translated, lang

schema.title: Human readable title
schema.root_cause: 5 Whys analysis result - the actual root cause
